name: LOADING HUMAN
blurb: The award-winning Adventure for Virtual Reality, powered by groundbreaking controls, set in a thrilling Sci-Fi world.

rewards.reward:
THE BACKER
============================
Thank you. Your name will be graved on the In-Game "wall of fame" and you will gain access our Backer's forum with a nice high resolution wallpaper waiting for you.
============================
NOTE: Each tier includes ALL previous rewards.

THE CLASSIC 
============================
You will get the DRM FREE digital copy of Loading Human for one of the supported platforms of your choice. (The retail version will cost more so grab the opportunity!).
============================
+ Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

THE DIGITAL
============================
You will get the VIP access to play the game 2 weeks before anyone else and the Digital Soundtrack Download.
============================
+ Digital copy + Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

THE CLASSIC 
============================
You will get the DRM FREE digital copy of Loading Human for one of the supported platforms of your choice. (The retail version will cost more so grab the opportunity!).
============================
+ Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

THE SANDBOX ============================ \r\nYou will receive the sandbox alpha build from our original Unity version of Loading Human as soon as the campaign is over. This is just a environmental build to give you an exclusive look into how the game started. But it's fun. And you'll have a special character's kickstarter skin for Prometheus.\r\n============================ + Early Access + Soundtrack Download + Digital copy + Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

THE DIGITAL
============================
You will get the VIP access to play the game 2 weeks before anyone else, the Digital Soundtrack Download and a Special Kickstarter Skin for your VR Alter Ego.
============================
+ Digital copy + Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

SEASON PASS BASIC ============================ You will get ALL 3 episodes as soon as they're ready. ============================ + Early Access + Soundtrack Download + Character Skin + Digital copy + Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

SEASON PASS
============================
You will get ALL 3 episodes as soon as they're ready, a full-length video featuring the walkthrough of the game with the team's audio commentary and the digital Artbook (PDF).
============================
+ Early Access + Soundtrack Download + Character Skin + Digital copy + Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

GET PHYSICAL! ============================  You will get the "Kickstarter-Edition Only" Boxed DVD Copy of Loading Human w/ manual, an exclusive T-shirt and the physical Hard-covered Book (with Screenplay and Artwork prints) and you will be part of the Beta testing team! Your early feedbacks will help us to improve the game, and maybe change it if your new ideas are fantastic. \r\n============================ + Season Pass + Game's Video Guide + Digital Artbook + Early Access + Soundtrack Download + Character Skin + Digital copy + Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

THE COLLECTOR ============================ 
All the pledges will be personally signed by all the team members and you will get a free signed copy of EVERY Untold Games Title we'll release in the next 10 years. This is a kickstarter-only deal.
============================
+ Beta tester + Backer's T-Shirt + Physical Artbook + Boxed Copy + Season Pass + Game's Video Guide + Digital Artbook + Early Access + Soundtrack Download + Character Skin + Digital copy + Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

ONE OF US ============================
You will have a personal subscription to the Untold Games's internal tracker forum, so you'll be able to follow all the discussions we'll have about the graphics, the story, the musics, the game's design and everything else. You'll be able to propose your ideas directly to us. You will be part of Loading Human's creative process.
============================
+ All pledge are signed + free games for 10 years + Beta tester + Backer's T-Shirt + Physical Artbook + Boxed Copy + Season Pass + Game's Video Guide + Digital Artbook + Early Access + Soundtrack Download + Character Skin + Digital copy + Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

THE PRODUCER ============================
Your name will appear in the opening credit under the "Associate producer" credits. First come, first served:  The first who pledges will be the first one to appear in the credits, and so on to the next.
============================
+ You are part of the team + All pledges are signed + free games for 10 years + Beta tester  + Backer's T-Shirt + Physical Artbook + Boxed Copy + Season Pass + Game's Video Guide + Digital Artbook + Early Access + Soundtrack Download + Character Skin + Digital copy + Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

THE SPONSOR ============================
Your business name, or logo, will appear in the opening credit, under the "Sponsored By" section. First come, first served:  The first who pledges will be the first one to appear in the credits, and so on to the next.
============================
+ You are part of the team + All pledges are signed + free games for 10 years + Beta tester  + Backer's T-Shirt + Physical Artbook + Boxed Copy + Season Pass + Game's Video Guide + Digital Artbook + Early Access + Soundtrack Download + Character Skin + Digital copy + Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper

THE STAR ============================
You will get a copy of the game where our main character Prometheus will have your face so you'll be able to see yourself in the game's mirrors. And If you give us permission, everyone else will be able to choose your face to play the game.
============================
+ You are part of the team + All pledges are signed + free games for 10 years + Beta tester + Backer's T-Shirt + Physical Artbook + Boxed Copy + Season Pass + Game's Video Guide + Digital Artbook + Early Access + Soundtrack Download + Character Skin + Digital copy + Your name in the game + Forum Access + Wallpaper
